definitions.definition: A familiar , invented name for a person or thing used instead of the actual name of the person or thing, often based on some noteworthy characteristic.
examples: "The Big Apple " is a common nickname for New York City.

definitions.definition: A familiar, shortened or diminutive name for a person or thing.
examples: My name is Jonathan, but I go by my nickname , Johnny.

main_definition: A familiar , invented name for a person or thing used instead of the actual name of the person or thing, often based on some noteworthy characteristic.
secondary_definitions: A familiar, shortened or diminutive name for a person or thing.
